TEXT: Play as Sora from kingdom hearts 2! NL Will you use Drive forms to beat your enemies, or maybe build a ~killer~ combo?
Wait a minute, Kingdom Hearts looks different than usual. I'mma hit it with my keyblade!

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~key~ ~wielder,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
